dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4095 IH: Save Children from Trauma Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. De La Cruz (for herself and Mr. Landsman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize grants to address the problems of persons who experience violence related stress.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Save Children from Trauma Act of 2023.

section.header: Grants to address the problems of persons who experience violence related stress
section.text: Section 582(j) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 290hhâ€“1(j)) is amended by striking $63,887,000 for each of fiscal years 2019 through 2023 and inserting $93,887,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2028.
